Description.Name: Contract for Emperor Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your friendship with The St. Ives Compact, they have offered you a contract with one of their mechwarriors. Purchasing this contract will permit a one-time airdrop of a St. Ives Emperor EMP-6A when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. After use, the contract is void and the Emperor can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
